title: Selfie of the Day
shortDescription: A brief introduction to selfie photography
fullDescription: Welcome to your first photography challenge! ðŸ“¸ We're starting with something fun and simple - daily selfies!...

mission.text: Take and share at least one selfie each day. That's it! It can be any kind of selfie you want - serious, silly, artsy, casual, whatever feels right in the moment.

rules: Your face should be visible in some way (even partially)
The photo must be taken by you (that's what makes it a selfie!)

tips.title: Angles
tips.description: Try different angles - high, low, or straight on

tips.title: Lighting
tips.description: Test out different lighting (window light looks amazing!)

tips.title: Ideas
tips.description: Morning coffee selfie? After-school victory pose? Bedtime peace sign? You decide!

reminders: These photos are just between us
Quality isn't important - having fun is!
Questions? Just ask! I'm here to help
Multiple photos per day are totally fine
You can always redo a day if you want
sharingInstructions: Find your challenge folder in our shared Google Drive
Name your file with the day number and date (example: 'Day1_Jan30')

feedback.policy: I'll check out your selfies regularly and share what I love about them. This is about getting comfortable with the camera and having fun - no pressure to be perfect! Remember, everyone takes dozens of selfies to get one they like - that's totally normal and part of the process!

milestones.title: Halfway There!
milestones.message: You've completed 3 days of selfies! How do you feel about the process so far?

milestones.title: Challenge Complete!
milestones.message: Congratulations on completing your first photography challenge! Let's review what you learned.

followUpQuestions: Which day's selfie was your favorite and why?
Did you discover any new angles or expressions you liked?
What was the most challenging part of taking daily selfies?
Would you be interested in a more advanced selfie challenge in the future?
